contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of August 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted and the Order of the Commonwealth Court is reversed based on this Court’s decisions in Guzan v. Commonwealth, 582 Pa. 187, 870 A.2d 810 (2005) and Schrankel v. Commonwealth, 562 Pa. 337, 755 A.2d 690, 692 (2000).
